hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated:"The Prophet (S) turned (finished the prayer) after two (Rak'ah), so Dhul-Yadain said: 'Has the prayer been shortened or have you forgotten O Messenger of Allah?" The Prophet (S) said: 'Is what Dhul-Yadain said the truth?' The people said yes, so Allah's Messenger (S) stood to perform the last two (Rakah) of Salat, then he said the Taslim. Then he said the Takbir and prostrated in a manner the same or longer than his (normal) prostrations

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يُسَلِّمُ فِي الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ مِنَ الظُّهْرِ وَالْعَصْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Man Who Says The Taslim After Two Rakah During The Zuhr Or Asr Prayers
